text: Arne Haugen Sørensen (born 27 April 1932) is a Danish painter and illustrator. He is one of Denmark's most productive religious artists, decorating over 25 churches. In 1975, Haugen Sørensen was awarded the Eckersberg Medal and, in 1984, the Thorvaldsen Medal. He was decorated a Knight of the Order of the Dannebrog. ==Related pages== *List of Danish painters ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Danish painters Category:Illustrators Category:People from Copenhagen
title: Arne Haugen Sørensen
